value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Model Performance Tuning in DAX Studio - By Marco Russo
value.excerpt: DAX Studio is the tool for data model tuning.  Marco Russo contributor to DAX Studio will be giving us a deep dive and demo around using DAX Studio for Model Performance Tuning.   You will not want to miss this event as Marco is a wealth of knowledge for all things Data Modeling!  Watch the Full Tutorial
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/ERGpV4yt30w" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: PowerBI.Tips - Tutorial - Stacked Bar Chart with Grand Totals
value.excerpt: This week we look at building a stacked bar chart on https://Charts.PowerBI.Tips  There is a little trick that you need to know no how to add a Y-Axis to the chart.  Additionally, at the end of the video we also show how to add a Grand Total for each bar column.    Visit our Site: https://powerbi.tips/

value.title: Computing a running total in DAX
value.excerpt: This video shows how to compute a running total over a dimension, like for example the date. Article and download: https://sql.bi/79926

value.title: Creating a calculated table with DAX Studio
value.excerpt: Use DAX Studio to write and test the expression for a calculated table in Power BI. How to learn DAX: https://www.sqlbi.com/guides/dax/ DAX Studio: https://daxstudio.org/
value.featuredContent: <iframe width="800" height="500" frameborder="0" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/yZnl2P9ik9g" allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen></iframe>

value.title: Add calculated tables and columns to Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: By the end of this module, you'll be able to add calculated tables and calculated columns to your data model. You'll also be able to describe row context, which is used to evaluated calculated column formulas. Because it's possible to add columns to a table using Power Query, you'll also learn when it's best to create calculated columns instead of Power Query computed columns.

value.title: Describe Power BI Desktop models
value.excerpt: In this module, you'll learn about the Power BI Desktop model structure, star schema design basics, analytics queries, and report visual configuration. This module provides a strong foundation on which you can learn to optimize model designs and add model calculations.

value.title: Discover customer needs as a Solution Architect for Dynamics 365 and Power Platform
value.excerpt: Learn how to ask customers questions about their business processes and feature requirements to create a viable solution.

value.title: Perform fit gap analysis
value.excerpt: Learn about performing a fit gap analysis as a solution architect for Dynamics 365 and Microsoft Power Platform.

value.title: Power Platform - Introduction, business value, and demos
value.excerpt: Explore the capabilities of Power Platform applications, as seen in demonstrations and customer case studies.

value.title: Propose a solution as a Solution Architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: Learn how to propose a solution.

value.title: Work with requirements as a solution architect for Power Platform and Dynamics 365
value.excerpt: It is important to capture the customer’s needs accurately. This module explains how to capture requirements and identify functional and non-functional items.

value.title: Create a Power BI Dashboard in 10 Minutes!
value.excerpt: Enjoy my free full course on Udemy https://www.udemy.com/share/102Qqu/ Learn how to quickly create your first dashboard using Microsoft Power BI fast. This tutorial will teach you how to load, transform and visualize data with ease.  Contact me on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/gaelimholland

value.excerpt: This is one of the most import function to master in Power BI. You can filter your data and create complex measure such as year over year comparisons with ease with these easy to follow tutorial. More more help this function.

value.title: 3 ways to embed Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, we will look at three ways that you can embed Power BI into your website or application. This includes the Publish to Web feature, using the REST APIs and the new Power BI Embedded service within Microsoft Azure.  Watch the behind the scenes video over on Guy in a Cube - https://youtu.be/OqbVZfFhEzA

value.title: Add a domain to your Power BI tenant (Office 365 / Azure Active Directory)
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how you can add a domain to your Power BI tenant. This is done by adding the domain through Azure Active Directory or Office 365.  LET'S CONNECT! value.title: Azure Active Directory and Power BI
value.excerpt: I take a look at how Power BI and Azure Active Directory interact.  Really it is more about Azure Active Directory and how do you get users into AAD.  This came up as I get pinged a lot from folks wondering how they can use AAD with Power BI, not necessarily realizing that it is already there.  http://blogs.technet.com/b/powerbisupport/archive/2015/09/15/azure-active-directory-and-power-bi.aspx

value.title: Common Data Service for Analytics (CDS-A) and Power BI - an Introduction
value.excerpt: In this video, Matthew Roche joins Adam for a look at the Common Data Service for Analytics. This is an offering that will be coming out in public preview in the Summer of 2018 and will help you to bring together data sources into a common schema.  Business Application Platform: Power BI | Business Applications

value.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI
value.excerpt: In this video, Adam looks at how to use conditional columns within Power Query and then copying them for use in other queries or Power BI Desktop files. This is a great technique if you don't want to retype all of the conditional items in the dialog in Power BI.  LET'S CONNECT!  Guy in a Cube -- https://guyinacube.com

images.title: Copy Conditional Columns in Power Query or Power BI

value.title: Create a Power BI app registration in 6 steps
value.excerpt: We look at a Power BI tutorial on how to properly complete the app registration within Azure Active Directory (AAD). This power bi tutorial is needed as we see many questions about the proper configuration for a Power BI app registration regarding which settings to use.  App registrations are needed
